realestate.name: MyHome Group Real Estate Agent
realestate.description: Voice agent for MyHome Group real estate inquiries, property details, and pricing information
realestate.startup_message: <speak xml:lang='en-IN'><prosody rate='medium' pitch='0%'>Welcome to MyHome Constructions. How may I help you with your real estate inquiries today?</prosody></speak>

hospital.name: Yashoda Hospital Agent
hospital.description: Voice agent for Yashoda Hospital appointment scheduling and inquiries
hospital.startup_message: <speak xml:lang='en-IN'><prosody rate='medium' pitch='0%'>Welcome to <say-as interpret-as='spell-out'>Ya</say-as><break time='100ms'/><say-as interpret-as='characters'>sho</say-as>da Hospital. How may I assist you with your appointment or medical inquiry today?</prosody></speak>

default_messages.error: <speak xml:lang='en-IN'><prosody rate='medium' pitch='0%'>I apologize, I couldn't understand. Please try again.</prosody></speak>
default_messages.unclear_audio: <speak xml:lang='en-IN'><prosody rate='medium' pitch='0%'>I couldn't hear you clearly. Could you please repeat?</prosody></speak>
